PostToolUse.description: Format markdown files with Prettier after editing
Auto-fix WordPress coding standards in PHP files

PostToolUse.command: head -1 "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" | grep -q '^---$' || echo 'WARNING: SKILL.md missing YAML frontmatter'
PostToolUse.description: Verify SKILL.md files have YAML frontmatter

PreCommit.command: BANNED='delve|tapestry|myriad|leverage|utilize|seamless|robust|paradigm|synergy|cutting-edge|game-changer'; FOUND=$(grep -r -l -E "$BANNED" --include='*.md' . 2>/dev/null | grep -v archive/ | grep -v node_modules/ || true); if [ -n "$FOUND" ]; then echo "WARNING: AI indicator words in: $FOUND"; fi
PreCommit.description: Check for AI indicator words in non-archived files

PreCommit.command: for f in $(git diff --cached --name-only --diff-filter=ACM | grep '\.php$'); do grep -L 'defined.*ABSPATH' "$f" 2>/dev/null && echo "WARNING: $f missing ABSPATH check" || true; done
PreCommit.description: Verify PHP files check for ABSPATH
